scripts.db:push: HOME=$PWD XDG_CACHE_HOME=./.cache PRISMA_ENGINES_CACHE_DIR=./.prisma-cache DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL:-file:./dev.db} prisma db push --schema prisma/schema.prisma --skip-generate
scripts.prisma:generate: HOME=$PWD XDG_CACHE_HOME=./.cache PRISMA_ENGINES_CACHE_DIR=./.prisma-cache prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma
